item.description:
Sorry for the mix-up. Our event this week was scheduled for the same night as the Revolve Nation Quarterly Party! I have included the information and link below. We always have around 150 to 200 people attend these events, with a strong green business presence. I hope to see you all there. Also, feel free to sign up at our other meet-up, Revolve Nation, for more notices on these events, other events, seminars and panels.

http://entrepreneur.m...

3rd Annual Revolve Nation Holiday Networking Party at The Greatest Bar!

Join us for a fun evening of networking, music, food and drinks and meet over a hundred colleagues in entrepreneurship at this great event. Discover new business partners, build rewarding relationships, and network with the largest and most premiere networking organization in Boston, Revolve Nation: Boston Entrepreneurs Group!

When; Thursday, November 20th 6pm-9pm

Where: The Greatest Bar
262 Friend Street
Boston, MA 02114

RSVP as space is limited!!!!!!!

Sponsored By: Exemplar Companies, Inc. www.exemplarcompanies.com
Revolve, Inc. www.revolvethis.com
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the stiff in the suit

group.name: Revolve Nation: Boston's Green and Sustainable Business Grp

item.name: Boston's Green and Sustainable Business Grp (Revolve Nation) November Meetup
